name: Bill Laimbeer
description: 6'11" center, Bad Boy Pistons enforcer. Two-time champion, 4-time All-Star. The most hated player in the NBA - flopper, cheap shot artist, villain everyone loved to hate.

flagrant-foul.name: Flagrant Foul
flagrant-foul.description: Mid-hard-foul, the kind that started fights
flagrant-foul.prompt: tall center delivering hard flagrant foul - elbow out making contact, body leaning into opponent, face showing zero remorse, the kind of foul that started brawls, pure unapologetic aggression

theatrical-flop.name: Theatrical Flop
theatrical-flop.description: The most dramatic flop in NBA history
theatrical-flop.prompt: tall center falling backward in dramatic flop - arms flailing, head snapping back, selling minimal contact like a gunshot wound, theatrical performance worthy of an Oscar, the art of deception

trash-talking.name: Trash Talking
trash-talking.description: Getting in opponent's face, constant verbal warfare
trash-talking.prompt: tall center trash talking directly in opponent's face - finger pointing, mouth open mid-insult, sneering contempt, invading personal space, psychological warfare through constant verbal abuse

setting-hard-screen.name: Illegal Screen
setting-hard-screen.description: The 'accidentally' illegal screen that levels opponents
setting-hard-screen.prompt: tall center setting brutal illegal screen - shoulder and hip extended into opponent's path, making it look legal while maximizing damage, slight smirk knowing exactly what he's doing, plausible deniability

arms-raised-innocent.name: False Innocence
arms-raised-innocent.prompt: tall center with arms raised in mock innocence after flagrant foul - palms up, eyebrows raised, mouth open in fake surprise, 'Who me?' expression while opponent writhes on floor, the villain's signature move
